com.epoch.db

Class SQLWithQMarks

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.db.DBCommon
      • com.epoch.db.SQLWithQMarks

  • public final class SQLWithQMarks
extends DBCommon
    Class that contains an SQL statement containing question marks plus the number of question marks. Useful when SQL gets passed among methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private String sql
      The SQL containing question marks.
      private Object[] values
      The values to substitute for the question marks in the SQL.

      • addToString

        private void addToString(StringBuilder bld,
                         Object value,
                         boolean[] first)
        Auxiliary method to convert this object into a string; called recursively when the value is an Object[].
        Parameters:
        bld - StringBuilder, modified by this method
        value - the value to be added
        first - whether this value is the first one to be added; stored in an array so calling method's value is also altered
